sellerCard.description:
Welcome to Ninja Designer,

I'm Abu Saied, a highly skilled web designer specializing in Figma, UI/UX design, WordPress, and various CMS. I am not just a website creator; I craft digital masterpieces that exceed your expectations and generate sales.

What's the secret sauce? An awesome creative team with a keen eye for detail, effective collaboration, and excellent tech skills. With my expertise, I can transform your online presence into something truly enchanting.

Ready to take your online business to the next level? Let's create a functional business that will take you to new heights! ðŸŽ¯ðŸš€

description.content:
Looking for a Wix expert to design and redesign, build Wix website or Wix online store?


You're in the right place!


I'm a certified Wix developer with years of experience delivering high-quality Wix design solutions. Whether you need a fresh Wix website or a complete revamp of your Wix online store, I can craft custom solutions tailored to your brand or business needs.


What I Offer:


  • Create Wix Website, Wix Landing Page Design from Scratch
  • Wix Online Store Setup for eCommerce Business
  • Wix Website Development with Fully Mobile Responsive & User-Centric Design
  • Full Integration with Booking, Payment Gateways, Contact Forms, Social Media & More
  • Modern Layout for Seamless Functionality, Great UX & Aesthetic Appeal


Why Choose Me?


  • Free Consultation from Expert UI + Web Developer Team
  • On-Time Delivery & Post-Delivery Support
  • 24/7 Constant Communication and Updates (Literally)


Ready to elevate your online presence? Let's work together to build Wix website that stands out.

slide.name: be wix expert, wix developer for wix design, wix website or wix online store

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is Wix and is it right for me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Wix is a leading website builder that requires no coding skills. It's perfect for entrepreneurs, small businesses, and individuals seeking a professional online presence at an affordable price point.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide for my Wix website project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: For your Wix website please share essential materials including the brand logo, Page content and structure, Social media links, Business information, and Images (stock photos available if needed) and your Wix login to migrate your website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide Wix subscription and domain in this gig?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, you'll need to purchase your own Wix subscription plan and domain separately. I'll guide you through connecting these to your new website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my Wix websites mobile-responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! Every website I create is fully optimized for all devices - desktop, tablet, and mobile phones. Need more information? Feel free to message me! ðŸš€

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you integrate custom features or third-party apps into my Wix website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can integrate custom features and third-party apps into your Wix website to enhance functionality, including live chat, analytics, forms, email marketing tools, social media feeds and more.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide post-delivery support or revisions if needed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer post-delivery support and unlimited revisions to ensure youâ€™re completely satisfied with your Wix website. Need more information? Feel free to message me! ðŸš€

questionsAndAnswers.question: What post-launch support is included in your service?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Some examples of our ongoing support include: Answering your questions, Making minor edits, Troubleshooting basic issues etc. Not included: Major website redesign, Complex feature adding, SEO services and content writing.
